title: Pack's Queen
description: Pack’s Queen is the epic, fast-paced conclusion of the Wolves of Crimson Hollow trilogy. Get ready for romance, action, and jaw-dropping revelations.After a harrowing battle in Shadow Creek, Red and her allies defeated Valerius and freed his wolves. But the victory came at a great cost. Tristan was captured by the archdemon Harkon, and Dante’s whereabouts are unknown.Despite the odds stacked up against her, Red is determined to save her mates at any cost. Even if it means making deals with devilish creatures or working side by side her ex.
author: M.H. Soars
